resources.string: By selecting the Mixing effect, you wil be able to mix two sound signals together. Please click on \"USE Mixing\" at the bottom of the page to use this effect and play two sounds at the same time.

By selecting the Speed effect, you will be able to change the speed of your sound signal\'s playback. Please click on \"Use Speed\" at the bottom of the page to use this effect and change your playback speed.

By selecting the Gain effect, you will bbe able to increase the volume of your sound\'s playback. Please click on the \"USE Gain\" button at the bottom of the page to use this effect and change the playback volume.
